# llms.txt for www.rctechsolutions.com
# Owner: RC Tech Solutions
# Effective: January 2026

site: https://www.rctechsolutions.com
owner: RC Tech Solutions
contact_page: https://www.rctechsolutions.com/contact
email: business@rctechsolutions.com

# Organization
organization:
  name: RC Tech Solutions
  founder: Rahul Chauhan
  location: 3126, Sector 82, JLPL Industrial Area, Mohali, Punjab, India

# Site Structure
pages:
  - /
  - /about
  - /contact
  - /blogs
  - /ebook
  - /services/web-development
  - /services/seo
  - /services/ai-powered
  - /services/digital-branding
  - /services/mobile-apps
  - /services/devops-and-cloud
  - /privacy-policy
  - /terms-of-services

# Allowed Usage
allow:
  - indexing
  - summarization
  - topical extraction
  - service categorization
  - automated content discovery
  - citation of public content with attribution

# Disallowed Usage
disallow:
  - re-publishing full proprietary content without permission
  - training commercial models on full text without consent
  - impersonation of RC Tech Solutions or its leadership
  - generation of fake testimonials or reviews
  - use of brand assets (logos, trademarks) for resale

# Attribution Requirement
attribution:
  required: true
  format: "Source: RC Tech Solutions (https://www.rctechsolutions.com)"

# Content Labels by Topic
topics:
  web_development: >
    Covers custom web development, front-end and back-end applications,
    full-stack projects, eCommerce, CMS integration, and related services. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

  seo_and_marketing: >
    Includes technical SEO, keyword strategy, on-page optimization,
    content marketing, analytics and reporting. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}

  artificial_intelligence: >
    AI-powered solutions including chatbots, NLP, predictive analytics,
    and AI integration for apps and websites. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

  digital_branding: >
    Branding services, visual identity, logo design, social media
    strategy, content creation, and brand positioning. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}

  cloud_devops: >
    DevOps, CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, monitoring, and
    auto-scaling solutions. :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}

  mobile_app_development: >
    Cross-platform and native mobile app services with UI/UX design,
    backend integration, and deployment support. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}

# Notes
notes: >
